rev.desc.rev.desc: update panel check.action and decide.restart
update panel start, find.next.wizard, find.prev.wizard, add:
$L.void=jscall("debugUtils.log", "wizard="+$L.wizard.name)
Exception happens when click on consolidate relationship in viewing CI page.
set the multirecord to true in call.view
QCCR1E57215--Wizard looping over every item in a selection list when no selection is made.
RAD wizard.run, panel decide.restart, check if there is any records in $L.selection
-ag-wizard.run --goto-> decide.restart add as below:
and not null($L.selection)
QC7533 - On the setup.init.wizard panel, took out the nullsub when setting the value of $L.wizard.prompt so that the prompt message does not default to the name of the wizard if NULL.

DE1962 - changed 'previous' exit on the display.decide decision panel to new panel, find.prev.wizard, that decides which previous panel to go to based on conditions (this is coupled with new fields added to the wizard table to support this functionality)
Allow different main/template formats and introduce a "never prompt for cancel" flag.
Modified the panel select.no.records. Changed the expression ($L.wizard.error.msg=evaluate($L.wizard.error.msg)) to ($L.wizard.error.msg=evaluate(parse($L.wizard.error.msg, 2)))
DE1263: Modified check.action panel:added check for when $L.selection is null.
if ($L.ms=false) then ($L.selection=NULL)
Added support for multiple selection
added a variable called $L.override.link to the check.get.link panel. This variable can be set in the wizard so that if you don't want the link overridden it won't be.
recompiled.
Modified the post.display panel to deal with cursor placement for DE164.
I added the following expressions:
$L.field.name.is=NULL
if ($L.option=0 and wizard.type in $L.wizard~="select.many" and wizard.type in $L.wizard~="select.one") then ($L.field.name.is=cursor.field.name())
cursor.field.name.set($L.field.name.is)
if (not null($L.field.name.is) and type($L.field.name.is in $L.file)=8) then ($L.field.line.is=cursor.line(1);cursor.field.name.set($L.field.name.is, $L.field.line.is))
Added a "restart" action that restarts the current wizard.
Change the se.get.record that got the link to use se.get.link so that the master link record is used.
Added a "skip display" option to the selction procedure.
Added ability to disable previous button only.
similar to change below, added variable to disable Next button only (but keeping the Previous button activated)
added variable to allow users to disable the Next/Previous buttons on a wizard.
" get.wizard.format panel
" $L.disable.next.previous=false
" $L.allow.finish=nullsub(evaluate(disable.next.previous in $L.wizard), false)
" display panel
" added $L.disable.next.previous to pass values and names
renamed panel decide.bad.fc to decide.bad.fc.1 and added a new process panel named decide.bad.fc with $L.finish=false
get.phase panel. Re-entered the value for the 'Unique Field' parameter. I placed double quotes around it, saved and re-compiled the application. This resolved the problem.
added expressions to evaluate javascript to the following panels:
init.expressions
run.expressions
exit.cancel
Modified to display format name + sub format name to alleviate caching problems.
Added ability for local variables to be modified in the display application and passed back.
added for loop to the exit.cancel panel to evaluate the cancel expressions from the wizard record.
Modified the select.file.setup panel to check for a "$" and do a evaluate parse if it has one.
if (index("$", select.query in $L.wizard)>0) then ($L.sql=evaluate(parse(select.query in $L.wizard, 2))) else ($L.sql=select.query in $L.wizard)

descript.descript: update panel check.action and decide.restart
update panel start, find.next.wizard, find.prev.wizard, add:
$L.void=jscall("debugUtils.log", "wizard="+$L.wizard.name)
Exception happens when click on consolidate relationship in viewing CI page.
set the multirecord to true in call.view
QCCR1E57215--Wizard looping over every item in a selection list when no selection is made.
RAD wizard.run, panel decide.restart, check if there is any records in $L.selection
-ag-wizard.run --goto-> decide.restart add as below:
and not null($L.selection)
QC7533 - On the setup.init.wizard panel, took out the nullsub when setting the value of $L.wizard.prompt so that the prompt message does not default to the name of the wizard if NULL.

DE1962 - changed 'previous' exit on the display.decide decision panel to new panel, find.prev.wizard, that decides which previous panel to go to based on conditions (this is coupled with new fields added to the wizard table to support this functionality)
Allow different main/template formats and introduce a "never prompt for cancel" flag.
Modified the panel select.no.records. Changed the expression ($L.wizard.error.msg=evaluate($L.wizard.error.msg)) to ($L.wizard.error.msg=evaluate(parse($L.wizard.error.msg, 11)))
DE1263: Modified check.action panel:added check for when $L.selection is null.
if ($L.ms=false) then ($L.selection=NULL)
Added support for multiple selection
added a variable called $L.override.link to the check.get.link panel. This variable can be set in the wizard so that if you don't want the link overridden it won't be.
recompiled.
Modified the post.display panel to deal with cursor placement for DE179.
I added the following expressions:
$L.field.name.is=NULL
if ($L.option=0 and wizard.type in $L.wizard~="select.many" and wizard.type in $L.wizard~="select.one") then ($L.field.name.is=cursor.field.name())
cursor.field.name.set($L.field.name.is)
if (not null($L.field.name.is) and type($L.field.name.is in $L.file)=8) then ($L.field.line.is=cursor.line(1);cursor.field.name.set($L.field.name.is, $L.field.line.is))
Added a "restart" action that restarts the current wizard.
Change the se.get.record that got the link to use se.get.link so that the master link record is used.
Added a "skip display" option to the selction procedure.
Added ability to disable previous button only.
similar to change below, added variable to disable Next button only (but keeping the Previous button activated)
added variable to allow users to disable the Next/Previous buttons on a wizard.
" get.wizard.format panel
" $L.disable.next.previous=false
" $L.allow.finish=nullsub(evaluate(disable.next.previous in $L.wizard), false)
" display panel
" added $L.disable.next.previous to pass values and names
renamed panel decide.bad.fc to decide.bad.fc.1 and added a new process panel named decide.bad.fc with $L.finish=false
get.phase panel. Re-entered the value for the 'Unique Field' parameter. I placed double quotes around it, saved and re-compiled the application. This resolved the problem.
added expressions to evaluate javascript to the following panels:
init.expressions
run.expressions
exit.cancel
Modified to display format name + sub format name to alleviate caching problems.
Added ability for local variables to be modified in the display application and passed back.
added for loop to the exit.cancel panel to evaluate the cancel expressions from the wizard record.
Modified the select.file.setup panel to check for a "$" and do a evaluate parse if it has one.
if (index("$", select.query in $L.wizard)>0) then ($L.sql=evaluate(parse(select.query in $L.wizard, 2))) else ($L.sql=select.query in $L.wizard)
